# Interactive graph

<style>

  .axis line,
    .axis path {
      shape-rendering: crispEdges;
    }
    .axis text {
      font-size: 12px;
    }
    .line {
      fill: none;
      stroke-width: 1.5px;
      opacity: 0.7;
    }
    .line:hover {
      stroke-width: 2.5px;
      opacity: 1;
    }
    #controls {
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    button {
      margin: 5px;
      padding: 5px 10px;
      cursor: pointer;
      color: white;
    }
    button:hover {
      background-color: #d3d3d3;
    }
    .selected {
      background-color: #a9a9a9;
    }
</style> 

<div id="plot">
</div>

<div id="controls"></div>
<svg id="parallel-coordinates"></svg>


<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
<script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
